parameters.value:
{
                "item": result.item.ITM_NUMBER,
                "codProdutoSap": result.item.MATERIAL,
                "juros": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZJUR'].CONDVALUE,
                "jurosPorcen": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZJUR'].COND_VALUE,
                "psvCaixa": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZNEG'][CONDISACTI = ""].CONDVALUE,
                "valorLiquidoSemEncargos": $substringBefore(result.setor, "-") = "03" ? result.item.NET_VALUE : result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZLSE'].CONDVALUE,
                "valorTotalNF": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZINF'].CONDVALUE,
                "psv": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZPCO'].CONDVALUE,
                "margemPercent": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZMC1'].COND_VALUE,
                "margem": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZMC1'].CONDVALUE,
                "icmsDestinoPorcen": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ICAP'].COND_VALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ICAP'].COND_VALUE : "0",
                "icmsDestinoValor": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ICAP'].CONDVALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ICAP'].CONDVALUE : "0",
                "icmsValor": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ICM3'].CONDVALUE,
                "icmsPorcen": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZIP9'].COND_VALUE,
                "pisPorcen": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'IPS3'].COND_VALUE,
                "pisValor": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'IPS3'].CONDVALUE,
                "cofinsPorcen": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ICN3'].COND_VALUE,
                "cofinsValor": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ICN3'].CONDVALUE,
                "ipiPorcen": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZIP8'].COND_VALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZIP8'].COND_VALUE : "0",
                "ipiValor": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'IPI3'].CONDVALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'IPI3'].CONDVALUE : "0",
                "incentivoICMSPorcen": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZCM3'].COND_VALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZCM3'].COND_VALUE : "0",
                "incentivoICMSValor": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZCM3'].CONDVALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZCM3'].CONDVALUE : "0",
                "pesoLiquido": result.item.NET_WEIGHT,
                "pesoBruto": result.item.GROSS_WEIG,
                "volume_Metragem": result.item.VOLUME,
                "valorMostruario": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZDSR'][CONDISACTI = ""].CONDVALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZDSR'][CONDISACTI = ""].CONDVALUE : "0",
                "armazenagemST": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZARM'].COND_VALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZARM'].COND_VALUE : "0" ,
                "valorComFreteCIF": "0",
                "frete": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZFRS'].COND_VALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZFRS'].COND_VALUE : "0",
                "valorConhecimentoFreteUnit": "0",
                "substituicaoTributaria": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ICS3'].CONDVALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ICS3'].CONDVALUE : "0",
                "substituicaoTributariaPorcen": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ICS3'].COND_VALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ICS3'].COND_VALUE : "0",
                "costOfSales": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = "ZCMU"].CONDVALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = "ZCMU"].CONDVALUE : "0",
                "icmsPsv": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZTL4'].COND_VALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ZTL4'].COND_VALUE : "0",
                "precoAVista": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = "ZNEP"].COND_VALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = "ZNEP"].COND_VALUE : "0",
                "icmsDisplay": result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'ICM3'].COND_VALUE,
                "ipiDisplay": $exists(result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'IPI3'].COND_VALUE) = true ? result.ZSDSF[COND_TYPE = 'IPI3'].COND_VALUE : "0"
}
